ItemSource.SourceLine: Function CancelClose(appQuitting as Boolean) As Boolean
if mPageSetup is nil then InitPageSetup
Sub Constructor(inReport as rbrwReport, inRepLandscape as rbrwReport=nil, pageSetup as printerSetup=nil)
// call the Window constructor, or Open events will not fire

ItemSource.NoteLine: For infrastructure reasons, the MFC version has a factory function oofAfxCreateReportView invoking oofRepWindow::CreateReportWIndow
We just allow a window to be created, partly because RB users may use the implicit instance approach.
Thus, the CreatePreviewContent method is called in the window Constructor, as the last step
support scaling with mCachedScaleRatio and mScaleFactor and sZoomType
Methods below have a trailing status + for implemented, * for stubbed either of which may have a P to indicate they were added with a Computed Property rather than Method
CreatePreviewContent + but needs multireport stuff adding
CreateReportWindow -- factory function replaced by code in constructor
finish -- discarded in favour of mEnv.finish
setLandscapeReport -- not needed at present, was used by factory functions
setPageSetup -- not needed at present, was used by factory functions
setReport -- not needed at present, was used by factory functions
start -- discarded in favour of mEnv.start

GetAccessor.SourceLine: if not(mRepLandscape is nil ) and IsLandscapeMode then
